DOC.brief_summary: Tetrabenazine show improve gate abnormal visual stimulus improve postural stability Huntington disease ( HD ) patient measure computerized dynamic posturography test . This study aim elucidate whether partial dopaminergic depletion via low dose tetrabenazine similar effect mask abnormal visual stimulus Stroop interference test .
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis Huntington disease movement disorder expert Patients currently take tetrabenazine . Patients take dopamine receptor block medication least three day
